requireLogin.title: Login Wall
requireLogin.description: Indicates whether the login wall should be set, requiring users to log in.

suggestIdp.title: Suggest IDP
suggestIdp.description: A string with the name of the identity provider to suggest for the user.

customExtensionIcon.title: Replace Extension Icon
customExtensionIcon.description: Indicates whether to replace the default extension icon with the one set up for DeepL Home if available.

enforceSsoAutologin.title: Enforce SSO Autologin
enforceSsoAutologin.description: Indicates whether to enforce SSO autologin, immediately forwarding the user to the SSO page instead of the onboarding

skipOnboarding.title: Skip Onboarding
skipOnboarding.description: If true, skips the onboarding flow after installation.

preventFeedbackSurvey.title: Prevent Feedback Survey
preventFeedbackSurvey.description: If true, prevents feedback survey popups from being shown.

hideWrite.title: Hide Write
hideWrite.description: Indicates whether to hide Write features from the UI, including Write icons, tabs, and upgrade options for Write
